This is the more common pattern. A recent alternative is DAT_NOM (Мурадыс Кьурбан  гьа1сил йишири). Apart from this, a symmetrical construction is possible.

Same as 81, different pattern. This construction presupposes that Murad was the initiator. Alternative is the symmetrical construction: “murad na q'urban kidžidılqha-ra a” [PN and PN HPL.IPF.fight-SIMUL be_in].
CV. Alternative is the symmetrical construction “Мурада на Кьурбана дуствалды ваъара а” [M. and K. friendship(a) a-do.ipf-simul be_in].

Same as 17, different pattern. Transimpersonal. The NP in the nominative case does not trigger verb agreement as evident from the (somewhat unnatural) constructions where the absolutive NP is in the plural “mised emiš-m-ıχda kivi-bır ruxu-ra”.
